alert.note: Alert for Pribilof Islands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 12 at 2:55PM AKST until February 14 at 3:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM SUNDAY TO 3 AM AKST MONDAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow expected. East-northeast winds 30 to 35 mph with gusts to 40 mph. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. * WHERE...Pribilof Islands. * WHEN...From 6 PM Sunday to 3 AM AKST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. Areas of blowing snow will reduce visibilities to one half mile or less at times. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow and gusty winds will begin Sunday evening across the Pribilofs, producing sustained periods of low visibility into the overnight hours. As snow begins to taper off Monday morning and become showery in nature, visibility is expected to improve.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
